animeDescription: The film is set in the distant future in a city called Cahmpon. A scientist creates a synthetic life-form called Noiseman, which erases music from the airwaves by turning it into crystals. A group of Biker street kids rebels against this tyranny. (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Morimoto, Kouji', 'Director, Setting, Character Design, Animation Director'], ['Matsumi, Shinichi', 'Director'], ['Yuasa, Masaaki', 'Storyboard, Animation Director, Key Animation, Character Design'], ['Kanno, Yoko', 'Music']]
